    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public void delete(MessageHash hash)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionService
        Deletes a particular transaction from the enclave Returns whether the desired state was achieved i.e. true if the message no longer exists, false if the message still exists

        Note that the method will return true if trying to delete a non-existant message, since the desired state of the message no longer existing is satisfied

        Specified by:
        delete in interface TransactionService
        Parameters:
        hash - The hash of the payload that should be deleted

      • retrieveAllForRecipient

        public Collection<EncodedPayloadWithRecipients> retrieveAllForRecipient(Key recipientPublicKey)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionService
        Retrieves all payloads that the provided key is a recipient to
        Specified by:
        retrieveAllForRecipient in interface TransactionService
        Parameters:
        recipientPublicKey - The key for which to search over
        Returns:
        The list of all payloads that have the given key as a recipient

      • retrievePayload

        public EncodedPayloadWithRecipients retrievePayload(MessageHash hash)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionService
        Retrieves the message specified by the provided hash, and checks the intended recipient is present in the recipient list

        If the given recipient is present, then modifies the returned payload to only include that recipient in the sealed box list so that it can be sent to the other nodes

        Specified by:
        retrievePayload in interface TransactionService
        Parameters:
        hash - The hash of the message to retrieve
        Returns:
        The encrypted payload if found

      • retrieveUnencryptedTransaction

        public byte[] retrieveUnencryptedTransaction(MessageHash hash,
                                             Key providedKey)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionService
        Retrieves the message specified by the provided hash, and uses the provided key as the sender of the message

        Returns the unencrypted payload that is contained within so that Quorum can process it

        Specified by:
        retrieveUnencryptedTransaction in interface TransactionService
        Parameters:
        hash - The hash of the message to retrieve
        providedKey - The public key of the sender to use (or null if we are the originator)
        Returns:
        The encrypted payload if the sender keys match

      • storeEncodedPayload

        public MessageHash storeEncodedPayload(EncodedPayloadWithRecipients payloadWithRecipients)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionService
        Store the sealed payload in the database that was propagated to from another node
        Specified by:
        storeEncodedPayload in interface TransactionService
        Parameters:
        payloadWithRecipients - the decoded message that gets sent between nodes
        Returns:
        the SHA3-513 hash of the encrypted message

      • encryptPayload

        public EncodedPayloadWithRecipients encryptPayload(byte[] message,
                                                   Key senderPublicKey,
                                                   List<Key> recipientPublicKeys)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionService
        Encrypts the payload using each of the given recipient keys and a random nonce against the given sender's public key.

        Produces a result that maps the given recipient key and nonce value against the resulting ciphertext

        Specified by:
        encryptPayload in interface TransactionService
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be encrypted
        senderPublicKey - The public key of the sender
        recipientPublicKeys - The list of public keys that are recipients of the this message
        Returns:
        A map of keys to nonces to cipher texts
